Articles.Content: I have a spotlight I would like to place at the launchpad shining on the spacecraft ready to launch. How do I move it to the launchpad and make it persistent.

you can't move stuff to the launchpad because the launchpad is not a ship, the game only lets you modify ships.
however, you can create a rover with the lights you want and park it near the launchpad. not too close, or you won't be able to launch new stuff. that's the closest thing you can get
You could use the mod Kerbal Konstructs (Search on this forum for it), which would mean that the spotlight would be persistent on all save files.
